scripts.start: npm run update:revision && npm run start:server
scripts.test: npm run build:test && npm run run:test
scripts.build:client: NODE_ENV=development node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js --debug src/client/client.js -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -o public/js/bookkeeper.js
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js src/client/client.js -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -o public/js/bookkeeper.js
scripts.build:test: NODE_ENV=development node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js --debug src/test/**/**/*.js -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] > test/test.js
scripts.watch: NODE_ENV=development node_modules/watchify/bin/cmd.js --debug src/client/client.js -v -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -o public/js/bookkeeper.js
